nodes.text: Vermia was a rat-faced female thief who was the apprentice and cohort of Ooblamon. She and her master went to the planet Taris to sell Darth Vader's lightsaber to the dark side of the Force cult Acolytes of the Beyond.
Vermia first appeared in one of the interludes in the novel Aftermath, which was written by Chuck Wendig and released in 2015.
